alert.note: Alert for Greeley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 03 at 1:53PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL GREELEY COUNTY THROUGH 115 PM MDT... At 1253 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles west of Horace, or 8 miles west of Tribune, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Horace around 100 PM MDT. Tribune around 105 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM MDT for west central Kansas.
